oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Soil treatments and rootstocks for organic apple production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lindhard Pedersen, Hanne
Pedersen, Birgitte
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The apple variety 'Retina' is recommended for organic production in Denmark. Yet, there is no knowledge regarding the optimal rootstock for this variety. Better knowledge is also needed on production techniques, such as weed control, where different machinery for mechanical weeding is available. Therefore, we tested the combined effect of different rootstocks and weeding techniques including soil covering with straw. As organic growers discus the necessity of weed cleaning at all, the natural vegetation was used as control treatment in the trials.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lindhard Pedersen, Hanne and Pedersen, Birgitte (2004) Soil treatments and rootstocks for organic apple production. DARCOFenews (1), pp. 1-3.
